mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ez_companyinfo( COMPANYNAME, INTRODUCE, ADDRESS, TELEPHONE, CELLPHONE, FAXPHONE, EMAIL, KEYWORDS, CONTACTPERSON) VALUES( #{companyName}, #{introduce}, #{address}, #{telephone}, #{cellphone}, #{faxphone}, #{email}, #{keywords}, #{contactPerson})
mapper.update: UPDATE ez_companyinfo SET COMPANYNAME = #{companyName}, INTRODUCE = #{introduce}, ADDRESS = #{address}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone}, CELLPHONE = #{cellphone}, FAXPHONE = #{faxphone}, EMAIL = #{email}, KEYWORDS = #{keywords}, CONTACTPERSON = #{contactPerson} WHERE ID = #{id}
